version_description:
* Now 2 bonus Hints given when video ad is watched
* Fixed an issue when Hints button was not shown on iPad
* Stopped IOS5 support

* Added winning real rewards provided by Kiip (available in some countries)
* Minor bugfixes

* Changes to meet recent Apple requirements
* Added an option to purchase for hints

* IOS update related corrections
* Earning hints by watching video is back again
* IOS9 related changes and improvements
* Minor bugfixes and improvements
* Several improvements
* Minor improvements and bugfixes
* Fixed a bug when hands on game over might be shown incorrectly
* Fixed few critical bugfixes
* IOS 10 related corrections
* Minor bugfixes and improvements

* Small extra rack was removed from iPhone.
* PRO features (without ad removing) are now available for all.
* Different improvements and bugfixes.
* Extra rack was returned back to the game due to your requests (iPhone).

* Added a new variation of the game: Progressive
* Other minor improvements

Thank you for leaving few words as a review in the App Store.
----
* Fixed an issue when all tiles might be moved to table not allowing to finish the game

New in version 2.6.0:
* Added a new variation of the game: Progressive
* Other minor improvements

• Fixed an issue related to finishing hand
• Twitter and Facebook sharing are temporarily disabled on IOS 11

If you are enjoying the game, please consider leaving a review or rating!

• Added background mode. So online game will not disconnect on the short-time switches to other applications (like incoming call or SMS conditions)
• Sharing the results on Twitter is active again for all IOS versions
• Now more bonus hints are gained in the game
• Invited games with friends are removed

If you are enjoying the game, please consider leaving a review or rating! Thanks!
• Fixed an issue when online games might stop responding in some conditions
* Improved stability and bug fixes
* Improved stability and bug fixes
* Fixed an issue when Top20 lists were not updated

• Added full iPhone X support
• Stability improvements and bug fixes

• Fixed an issue when ads might overlap tiles on iPhone X
• Added a rectangle to show where to drop a tile on the right side
• Bug fix: Player name on the iPad might be not shown
* Minor bugfixes and improvements

• Added Casino mode: online games with betting and winning Chips
• Chips are also used as in-game Hints
• Game view now includes two different buttons to open hand: as Series and Doubles
• Improvements for Leaderboard, Settings and Help pages

• Added weekly chips leaderboard

New in the version 3.0.0:
• Added Casino mode: online games with betting and winning Chips
• Chips are also used as in-game Hints
• Game view now includes two different buttons to open hand: as Series and Doubles
• Improvements for Leaderboard, Settings and Help pages

• Player who opened the hand and finished at the forth place now gets 50 chips
• Fixed an issue with sending feedback emails
• Option to remove ads by purchase returned back

New in the version 3.0.0:
• Added Casino mode: online games with betting and winning Chips
• Chips are also used as in-game Hints
• Game view now includes two different buttons to open hand: as Series and Doubles
• Improvements for Leaderboard, Settings and Help pages

• Redesign of game view for iPhone X to use all the space

New in the version 3.0.0:
• Added Casino mode: online games with betting and winning Chips
• Chips are also used as in-game Hints
• Game view now includes two different buttons to open hand: as Series and Doubles

• Extra small holder is extended to hold 7 tiles
• Fixed an issue found in the previous version which might crash app in some conditions

Important news starting since version 3.0.0:
• Added Casino mode: online games with betting and winning Chips
• Chips are also used as in-game Hints
• Game view now includes two different buttons to open hand: as Series and Doubles
• Redesign of the game view for iPhone X to use all the space

• Increased number of chips won in games
• Corrected an issue when the points of the left player was not seen on game over

• Fixed an issue when one in the hand might be shown incorrectly on game over
• Big ads now appear less often

* Video ads are now muted according app settings
* Rotation of the screen is corrected

• Sizes of  some elements were increased for iPhoneX
• Asking consent to use device ids for advertisement and online games
• Improvements and minor bug fixes
• Fixed an issue when the Twitter sharing may cause crashing of the app
• Minor improvements and bug fixes
• Few stability improvements
• Fixed an issue when the app might crash in some conditions
• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes
• Added changes for  CCPA compliance
• Minor improvements and bug fixes
• Stability improvements and minor bug fixes
• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes
• Stability improvements and minor bug fixes
• Fixed an issue when login might fail in some conditions
• Now the game supports all the device sizes
• Stability improvements and minor bug fixes

• Removed Twitter sharing
• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes
• Fixed an issue when Top20 tables were not shown
• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes

• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes

If you're enjoying the game, please leave us a rating and a review in the AppStore.
• Fixed an issue found in the previous update when the app might be crashed in some conditions

• Fixed an issue when some texts might be truncuated

If you're enjoying the game, please leave us a rating and a review in the AppStore.
• IOS 15 and new iPad mini related corrections for some design elements

• Internal improvements and minor bug fixes
If you're enjoying the game, please leave us a rating and a review in the AppStore.
